segment.source: Ratings Icons in ACM (Windows 10)
segment.target: Ratings Icons in ACM (Windows 10)

segment.source: Compatibility ratings can originate from Microsoft, the application vendor, your organization, and from the Application Compatibility Toolkit (ACT) community.
segment.target: Compatibility ratings can originate from Microsoft, the application vendor, your organization, and from the Application Compatibility Toolkit (ACT) community.

segment.source: Ratings Icons in ACM
segment.target: Ratings Icons in ACM

segment.source: Applies to
segment.target: Applies to

segment.source: Windows 10
segment.target: Windows 10

segment.source: Windows 8.1
segment.target: Windows 8.1

segment.source: Windows 8
segment.target: Windows 8

segment.source: Windows 7
segment.target: Windows 7

segment.source: Windows Server 2012
segment.target: Windows Server 2012

segment.source: Windows Server 2008 R2
segment.target: Windows Server 2008 R2

segment.source: Compatibility ratings can originate from Microsoft, the application vendor, your organization, and from the Application Compatibility Toolkit (ACT) community.
segment.target: Compatibility ratings can originate from Microsoft, the application vendor, your organization, and from the Application Compatibility Toolkit (ACT) community.

segment.source: For information about specifying your own ratings, see Selecting Your Compatibility Rating.
segment.target: For information about specifying your own ratings, see Selecting Your Compatibility Rating.

segment.source: For information about community ratings, see ACT Community Ratings and Process.
segment.target: For information about community ratings, see ACT Community Ratings and Process.

segment.source: Icons
segment.target: Icons

segment.source: The following table shows icons that appear on the report screens and dialog boxes for Company Assessment and Vendor Assessment.
segment.target: The following table shows icons that appear on the report screens and dialog boxes for Company Assessment and Vendor Assessment.

segment.source: Icon
segment.target: Icon

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Application, device, or website functions as expected on a 32-bit operating system.
segment.target: Application, device, or website functions as expected on a 32-bit operating system.

segment.source: Application, device, or website functions as expected on a 64-bit operating system.
segment.target: Application, device, or website functions as expected on a 64-bit operating system.

segment.source: Application, device, or website with issues that are minor or have known solutions on a 32-bit operating system.
segment.target: Application, device, or website with issues that are minor or have known solutions on a 32-bit operating system.

segment.source: Severity 3 issues are considered minor issues.
segment.target: Severity 3 issues are considered minor issues.

segment.source: Application, device, or website with issues that are minor or have known solutions on a 64-bit operating system.
segment.target: Application, device, or website with issues that are minor or have known solutions on a 64-bit operating system.

segment.source: Application, device, or website with major issues, such as data loss or severely impaired functionality, on 32-bit operating systems.
segment.target: Application, device, or website with major issues, such as data loss or severely impaired functionality, on 32-bit operating systems.

segment.source: Severity 1 and Severity 2 issues are considered major issues.
segment.target: Severity 1 and Severity 2 issues are considered major issues.

segment.source: Application, device, or website with major issues, such as data loss or severely impaired functionality, on 64-bit operating systems.
segment.target: Application, device, or website with major issues, such as data loss or severely impaired functionality, on 64-bit operating systems.

segment.source: Application, device, or website that does not have any application assessment data for 32-bit operating systems.
segment.target: Application, device, or website that does not have any application assessment data for 32-bit operating systems.

segment.source: The item does not match any information in the database, or no assessments have been submitted.
segment.target: The item does not match any information in the database, or no assessments have been submitted.

segment.source: Application, device, or website that does not have any application assessment data for 64-bit operating systems.
segment.target: Application, device, or website that does not have any application assessment data for 64-bit operating systems.

segment.source: User Ratings and ACT Community Ratings
segment.target: User Ratings and ACT Community Ratings

segment.source: Ratings are displayed graphically in the User Ratings column and the Community Assessment column.
segment.target: Ratings are displayed graphically in the User Ratings column and the Community Assessment column.

segment.source: The rating color and bar count depend on how the users or community rated the item.
segment.target: The rating color and bar count depend on how the users or community rated the item.

segment.source: There are three possible ratings:
segment.target: There are three possible ratings:

segment.source: Works.
segment.target: Works.

segment.source: Applications with this rating receive five green bars.
segment.target: Applications with this rating receive five green bars.

segment.source: Works with minor issues or has solutions.
segment.target: Works with minor issues or has solutions.

segment.source: Applications with this rating receive three light-green bars.
segment.target: Applications with this rating receive three light-green bars.

segment.source: Does not work.
segment.target: Does not work.

segment.source: Applications with this rating receive a single red bar.
segment.target: Applications with this rating receive a single red bar.

segment.source: The color gradient from one to five bars shows the average rating.
segment.target: The color gradient from one to five bars shows the average rating.

segment.source: act community
segment.target: act community
